resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105654</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105654</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207060</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Life of a Vertebrate Fossil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leben eines Vertebrate Fossils</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La vie d'un fossile vertébré</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vida de um fossil vertebrate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Durata di un fossile vertebrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωή ενός σπονδυλωτού απολιθώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vida de un fósil vertebrado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">traces the journey of fossils from discovery to display. Find out what paleontologists do in each stage a vertebrate fossil's life. Learn about digging up fossils, getting them to the laboratory, preparing them for research and exhibition, and understanding what they say about past life.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vollzieht die Reise der Fossilien von der 
Entdeckung nach, um anzuzeigen. Finden Sie heraus, was 
Paläontologen in jedem Stadium das Leben eines vertebrate Fossils 
tun. Erlernen Sie über das Graben herauf Fossilien, das 
Gelangen sie an das Labor, das Vorbereiten sie für Forschung und 
Ausstellung und das Verstehen, was sie ungefähr hinter dem Leben 
sagen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trace le voyage des fossiles de la découverte pour
afficher. Découvrez ce que les paléontologistes font dans le 
chaque l'étape la vie d'un fossile vertébré. Renseignez-vous 
sur creuser vers le haut des fossiles, en les obtenant au laboratoire,
préparant eux pour la recherche et l'exposition, et l'arrangement ce 
qu'ils disent environ après la vie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">segue a viagem dos fossils da descoberta para 
indicar. Encontre para fora o que os paleontologists fazem no 
cada o estágio vida de um fossil vertebrate. Aprenda sobre 
escavar acima dos fossils, começá-los ao laboratório, prepará-los 
para a pesquisa e o exhibition, e a compreensão de o que dizem 
aproximadamente após a vida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">segue il viaggio dei fossili dalla scoperta per 
visualizzare. Scopra che cosa i paleontologists fanno in ogni la
fase vita del fossile vertebrato. Impari circa la scavatura sui 
fossili, ottenerli al laboratorio, prepararli per la ricerca e la 
mostra e capire che cosa dicono circa oltre vita.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επισημαίνει το ταξίδι των απολιθωμάτων από την 
ανακάλυψη στην παρουσίαση. Ανακαλύψτε ποια παλαιοντολόγος 
κάνουν σε κάθε στάδιο η ζωή ενός σπονδυλωτού απολιθώματος. 
Μάθετε για να σκάψει επάνω τα απολιθώματα, να φτάσει τα στο
εργαστήριο, την προετοιμασία τους για την έρευνα και την έκθεση, 
και την κατανόηση τι λένε για την προηγούμενη ζωή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rastrea el viaje de fósiles del descubrimiento 
para visualizar. Descubra lo que hacen los paleontólogos en cada 
la etapa la vida de un fósil vertebrado. Aprenda sobre cavar 
encima de fósiles, conseguirlos al laboratorio, la preparación de 
ellos para la investigación y la exposición, y entender lo que dicen
alrededor más allá de vida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207060</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105654</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/life-of-a-vertebrate-fossil</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
